translation: Better indeed is knowledge than practice; better than knowledge is meditation; better than meditation is the renunciation of the fruits of actions: peace immediately follows renunciation.
commentary: 12.12 Shreyah better? Hi indeed? Knowledge knowledge? From practice than practice? From knowledge than knowledge? meditation meditation? Specifically excels? From meditation than meditation? Karmaphalatyagah the renunciation of the fruits of actions? tyagat from renunciation? Peace: peace? Afterwards immediately.Commentary Theoretical or indirect knowledge of Brahman gained from the scriptures is better than the practice (of
